org.assertj.swing.edt
Class GuiLazyLoadingDescription

java.lang.Object
  org.assertj.core.description.Description
      org.assertj.swing.edt.GuiLazyLoadingDescription

public abstract class GuiLazyLoadingDescription
extends org.assertj.core.description.Description

Description that loads its text lazily, in the event dispatch thread (EDT.)

Author:
Alex Ruiz, Yvonne Wang

public final String value()
Executes loadDescription() in the event dispatch thread (EDT.)

Specified by:
value in class org.assertj.core.description.Description
Returns:

loadDescription

@RunsInCurrentThread
@Nonnull
protected abstract String loadDescription()

Returns the lazy-loaded text of this description.

Note: This method is accessed in the current executing thread. Such thread may or may not be the event dispatch thread (EDT.) Client code must call this method from the EDT.

Returns:
the lazy-loaded text of this description.
